quotes.quote: Love For All, Hatred For None.
quotes.author: Khalifatul Masih III

quotes.quote: Change the world by being yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, do it well.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Tough times never last but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schiuller

quotes.quote: One day the people that don’t even believe in you will tell everyone how they met you.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Hate comes from intimidation, love comes from appreciation.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: I don’t need it to be easy, I need it to be worth it.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Never let your emotions overpower your intelligence.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison
